author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tamilnad Mercantile Bank Limited has won the prestigious “Social Banking Excellence Award”, which was declared by ASSOCHAM India.

TMB was declared winner under the small banks category. This bank was conferred with this prestigious award for the third consecutive time, M. Gunasekaran, General Manager of the bank, said in a statement.

This award was presented at a programme in Mumbai on January 29 by Jayant Sinha, Minister of State for Finance. The award was given in recognition for categories under small banks for government schemes, urban and agricultural banking. This bank dedicates the award to customers, stakeholders and workforce, the statement added.
title: TMB bags Social Banking Excellence Award
